<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Set E-Signature migration property and reset HR task type choice options</description>
        <name>Set E-Signature migration property</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[setMigrationPropertyAndTaskTypeChoices();

function setMigrationPropertyAndTaskTypeChoices(){
  if(esignatureMigrationRequired()){
    gs.setProperty('sn_hr_core.isESignatureDataMigrated',false);
    resetOptionsForBeforeMigration();
  }
  else{
    gs.setProperty('sn_hr_core.isESignatureDataMigrated',true);
	resetOptionsForEsignPlugin();
	new sn_hr_core.migrateESignTasks().migrateHRTaskTemplates();  
  }
}

function resetOptionsForBeforeMigration(){
  var hrMigrationUtil = new global.HRMigrationUtil();
  var encodedQry = '';
  var setFields = {};
  encodedQry += 'name=' + 'sn_hr_core_task';
  encodedQry += '^element=' + 'hr_task_type' ;
  encodedQry += '^valueIN' + 'credential,e_signature,sign_document' ;
  setFields.inactive = false;
  hrMigrationUtil.updateGlobalRecord('sys_choice', encodedQry, setFields);

  encodedQry = '';
  setFields = {};
  encodedQry += 'name=' + 'sn_hr_core_task';
  encodedQry += '^element=' + 'hr_task_type' ;
  encodedQry += '^value=' + 'e_sign' ;
  setFields.inactive = true;
  hrMigrationUtil.updateGlobalRecord('sys_choice', encodedQry, setFields);
}

function resetOptionsForEsignPlugin(){
  var hrMigrationUtil = new global.HRMigrationUtil();
  var encodedQry = '';
  var setFields = {};
  encodedQry += 'name=' + 'sn_hr_core_task';
  encodedQry += '^element=' + 'hr_task_type' ;
  encodedQry += '^valueIN' + 'credential,e_signature,sign_document' ;
  setFields.inactive = true;
  hrMigrationUtil.updateGlobalRecord('sys_choice', encodedQry, setFields);

  encodedQry = '';
  setFields = {};
  encodedQry += 'name=' + 'sn_hr_core_task';
  encodedQry += '^element=' + 'hr_task_type' ;
  encodedQry += '^value=' + 'e_sign' ;
  setFields.inactive = false;
  hrMigrationUtil.updateGlobalRecord('sys_choice', encodedQry, setFields);
}

function esignatureMigrationRequired(){
  var esignTaskCount = 0;
  var esignMigRequired = false;
  var gr = new GlideAggregate("sn_hr_core_task");
  gr.addQuery('hr_task_type', 'IN', 'e_signature,sign_document,credential');
  gr.addAggregate('COUNT');
  gr.query();
  if(gr.next())
    esignTaskCount = gr.getAggregate('COUNT');
  if(esignTaskCount>0)
    esignMigRequired = true;
  return esignMigRequired;
}
]]></script>
